description: A charming family home located in a quiet neighborhood with excellent schools. Features a spacious living room, modern kitchen, and a beautiful backyard.
Stunning contemporary house with panoramic views. Open concept living, gourmet kitchen, and a master suite with a private balcony. Close to downtown.
Cozy starter home, recently renovated with new flooring and paint. Perfect for singles or a small family. Large front yard and easy access to public transport.
Luxury beachfront property with breathtaking ocean views. Features a private pool, spacious deck, and direct beach access. Ideal for entertaining.
Modern home perched on a hilltop, offering stunning city views. Open-plan living, smart home features, and a tranquil garden. Convenient to amenities.
Spacious suburban house with a large yard, perfect for families. Recently updated kitchen and bathrooms. Close to parks and a vibrant community center.
